function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of understanding of how buildings affect health in the context of a pandemic","Impact":"Increased risk of indoor diseases spread, including COVID-19","Mitigation":"Conduct interdisciplinary research to understand the impact of buildings on health during a pandemic","Technologies":"Data analysis, epidemiological models","People":"Occupants, stakeholders, housing researchers","Owner":"Interdisciplinary research teams, building designers, policymakers"},{"Description":"Uncertainties caused by the COVID-19 pandemic leading to a lack of pragmatic instructions to reduce indoor risks","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to indoor disease transmission","Mitigation":"Develop and provide pragmatic instructions for reducing indoor risks in response to COVID-19 uncertainties","Technologies":"Communication platforms, virtual collaboration tools","People":"Various stakeholders, occupants, housing researchers","Owner":"Research organizations, public health authorities, building designers"},{"Description":"Need for revision of building codes and certification processes to address specific pandemic-related needs","Impact":"Inadequate building requirements for pandemic situations, leading to increased risk of disease spread","Mitigation":"Revise building codes and certification processes to incorporate specific pandemic-related requirements","Technologies":"Digital modeling, simulation tools, building information modeling (BIM)","People":"Policy makers, building code officials","Owner":"Government agencies, standardization bodies, building industry associations"}]}
